languages.text: Вся кожа воина друкари была прошита гибкими кристаллическими нитями, меняющими цвет и позволяющими сливаться с окружением.
The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.
languages.original_text: Вся кожа воина друкари была прошита гибкими кристаллическими нитями, меняющими цвет и позволяющими сливаться с окружением.

traits.locale_text: The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match the surroundings and conceal the owner.
The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match the surroundings and conceal the owner.
The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.
The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.
The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.

languages.text: 黑暗灵族战士的皮肤，由柔韧的水晶线缝合而成。它的颜色会随着周围环境的变化而变化，从而为装备者提供掩护。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗灵族战士的皮肤，由柔韧的水晶线缝合而成。它的颜色会随着周围环境的变化而变化，从而为装备者提供掩护。

languages.text: Flexible Kristallfäden waren in die Haut des Drukhari-Kriegers eingenäht, deren Farben sich an die Umgebung anpassen und den Träger tarnen.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Flexible Kristallfäden waren in die Haut des Drukhari-Kriegers eingenäht, deren Farben sich an die Umgebung anpassen und den Träger tarnen.

languages.text: La peau du guerrier drukhari a été cousue à l'aide de fils de cristal flexibles dont les couleurs s'adaptent à l'environnement pour créer un camouflage.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.

traits.locale_text: La peau du guerrier drukhari a été cousue à l'aide de fils de cristal flexibles dont les couleurs s'adaptent à l'environnement pour créer un camouflage.

languages.text: La piel del guerrero Drukhari ha sido cosida con hilos de cristal flexible cuyo color se adapta al entorno, ocultando a su dueño.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.

traits.locale_text: La piel del guerrero Drukhari ha sido cosida con hilos de cristal flexible cuyo color se adapta al entorno, ocultando a su dueño.

languages.text: デュカーリの戦士の皮膚は、柔軟な水晶の糸で縫われてあり、糸の色は周囲の環境に合わせて変化し、戦士を隠した。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリの戦士の皮膚は、柔軟な水晶の糸で縫われてあり、糸の色は周囲の環境に合わせて変化し、戦士を隠した。

languages.text: Drukhari savaçının derisine; renkleri çevreye uyum sağlayan ve kullanıcısını gizleyen, esnek kristal ipler dikilmiş.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari warrior's skin was stitched with flexible crystal threads, whose colours shift to match their surroundings and conceal the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Drukhari savaşçının derisine, renkleri çevreye uyum sağlayan ve kullanıcısını gizleyen, esnek kristal ipler dikilmiş.
